thread.title: Roger Craddock
thread.title_full: SNCB/NMBS Europe évalué par Roger Craddock

author: Roger Craddock
title: Roger Craddock
text: Booking from the Uk with a Uk Credit Card should be straightforward and simple and it is except for Holland. Why the Dutch who are normally such a well orgainised people have a rail ticketing system that is vitually impossible to use, is beyond me . Their trains are good , but in order to use them, we book through the Belgian rail system, which we have found to be excellent.
